scenes.action_text: CHRIST COMPLEX Written by Jeffrey Scott Richards FADE IN: CLOSE SHOT-QUINN'S LEG A nervous leg shakes under the table. The appendage seems to be attached to someone who has a lot on their mind. INT. CAFE-DAY LOUIS, a college student in his late twenties stares at a friend who is sitting off screen. Louis is calm, almost villainous in how collective he is. He stares at this unseen
